title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\CVSSv3
name: CVSSv3
description:
Common Vulnerability Scoring System version 3.

For details, see https://www.first.org/cvss/specification-document

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.CVSSv3

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.base_score
params.description: The base score is a function of the base metric scores. https://www.first.org/cvss/specification-document#Base-Metrics

params.name: data.exploitability_score
params.description: The Exploitability sub-score equation is derived from the Base Exploitability metrics. https://www.first.org/cvss/specification-document#2-1-Exploitability-Metrics

params.name: data.impact_score
params.description: The Impact sub-score equation is derived from the Base Impact metrics.

params.name: data.attack_vector
params.description: This metric reflects the context by which vulnerability exploitation is possible.

params.name: data.attack_complexity
params.description: This metric describes the conditions beyond the attacker's control that must exist in order to exploit the vulnerability.

params.name: data.privileges_required
params.description: This metric describes the level of privileges an attacker must possess before successfully exploiting the vulnerability.

params.name: data.user_interaction
params.description: This metric captures the requirement for a human user, other than the attacker, to participate in the successful compromise of the vulnerable component.

params.name: data.scope
params.description: The Scope metric captures whether a vulnerability in one vulnerable component impacts resources in components beyond its security scope.

params.name: data.confidentiality_impact
params.description: This metric measures the impact to the confidentiality of the information resources managed by a software component due to a successfully exploited vulnerability.

params.name: data.integrity_impact
params.description: This metric measures the impact to integrity of a successfully exploited vulnerability.

params.name: data.availability_impact
params.description: This metric measures the impact to the availability of the impacted component resulting from a successfully exploited vulnerability.
